resources.string:
ðŸ“œ Last Updated: 16th March 2025 Welcome to FoodWheels! By using our platform, you agree to these Terms and Conditions.


ðŸ”¹ 1. Acceptance of Terms
 - Using this app means accepting all terms.
 - If you disagree, please do not use the service.


ðŸ”¹ 2. User Eligibility
 - Users must be 18+ or have parental permission.
 - Provide accurate information for account registration.


ðŸ”¹ 3. Account Security
 - Maintain the confidentiality of login credentials.
 - Report unauthorized access immediately.


ðŸ”¹ 4. Orders and Payment
 - Orders are final and cannot be canceled once confirmed.
 - Payments must be made via approved methods.


ðŸ”¹ 5. Delivery and Pickup
 - Delivery times are estimates only.
 - Provide an accurate address for delivery.


ðŸ”¹ 6. Cancellation and Refund Policy
 - Refunds will be issued for incorrect or missing items.
 - Refunds will be processed within 5-7 business days.


ðŸ”¹ 7. User Responsibilities
 - No misuse of the app for illegal activities.
 - Abusive behavior will result in account suspension.


ðŸ”¹ 8. Privacy and Data Protection
 - User data is collected for order fulfillment only.
 - No sharing of personal information without consent.


ðŸ”¹ 9. Contact Support
 - Email: support@foodwheels.com

By using this app, you acknowledge that you have read and agree to these Terms and Conditions."
